channel.title: [562] short list need help asap! [562]
channel.description:
Okay i have a small list of issues on my 562 that i need help with, thankyou. 1) How can i change where you are at login on creation of the account?(SOLVED) 2) How can i change where you go on death?(SOLVED) ^ they're same location ^ 3) Nobody loses items when they die, how can i make it so that normal players, donators, and mods do?
anyone out there that can help? please do i need this desperately!
